definition: strange tales and absurd arguments (idiom)/unreasonable remarks
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: I enjoy listening to his yarns.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜歡聽他的奇談怪論。

sentences.english: I shall report some of the strange remarks I heard in New York.
sentences.chinese: 我將介紹一下我在紐約聽到的一些奇談怪論。

sentences.english: Anecdotal instances are open to the criticism of biased selection .
sentences.chinese: 奇談怪論的例子容易受到帶有偏見的選擇的批評。

sentences.english: Don't talk about your ridiculous arguments, we don't want to hear them.
sentences.chinese: 趕緊收起你的那些奇談怪論，我們並不想聽。
